arts.ttl: Deportivo Alaves vs Atletico Madrid – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Deportivo Alaves and Atletico Madrid go head-to-head in La Liga on Saturday. Both sides will be searching for contrasting outcomes after underwhelming starts to the 2025/26 campaign, with Los Colchoneros especially keen to kickstart their title aspirations at the Estadio de Mendizorroza. arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid XI vs Deportivo Alaves – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Deportivo Alaves host Atletico Madrid at the Estadio Mendizorroza on Saturday evening in a pivotal La Liga encounter. The home side will be looking to build on their recent form under Eduardo Coudet, while Los Rojiblancos aim to bounce back from their disappointing draw against Elche last time out.
